name: Data Engineer
description:
Meet InsightWhale — a fully remote team of professionals helping businesses become data-driven all over the world. At InsightWhale, we provide Digital Analytics, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) and Business Intelligence services to small and medium-sized businesses from States, Canada, Australia and other awesome English-speaking places.

We are actively expanding in the Data Science and Machine Learning industries and are currently looking for an experienced, talented and sanguine Data Engineer, who's excited to take on a new challenge and surf the uncharted seas!

By working with us, you will:

  • Join a strong, multifaceted team of professionals;
  • Dive into exceptional projects and resolve one-of-a-kind cases (insightwhale.com/category/case-studies/);
  • Use your creativity and the latest technology to help foreign clients;
  • Certificate programs and refresher courses.

Requires stack of technologies: Big Query, Python, SQL, Git, Docker.

What you'll need:

  • Experience in Data Engineering for 3+ years;
  • Background of work with Google Cloud Platform (BigQuery) or AWS for 2-3 years;
  • Experience in DHW architecture design for analytical projects in PowerBI (DWH/BI);
  • Experience in Python programming for 3+ years;
  • Deep knowledge of SQL;
  • Comprehensive knowledge of Git and Docker;
  • English working proficiency at upper-intermediate level;
  • Experience in working with API and creating connectors for ETL processes will be an advantage;
  • Knowledge of Kimball's approach and DWH design principles.

What you'll be doing:

  • Creating DWH/BI database architecture;
  • Setting up the ETL process including matilion, talend, and custom airflow + Python scripts installation;
  • Building complex SQL queries to create views (virtual tables).

Additional perks you'll love:

  • Fully-remote freedom to choose any working location you desire;
  • Flexible working schedule that is actually flexible;
  • Good salary, established with the candidate together;
  • Unconventional tasks and work with the latest technologies;
  • Continuous professional growth with our certificate and training programs!

We love exotic cases, have big ambitions and offer impressive prospects for your personal and professional growth. By joining us, you'll explore engaging and unusual projects while expanding in the Data Engineering, Data Science and Machine Learning industries.

Come get your dream job ;)
